short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manually record a vertical position on page to return to later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll Pin allows you to pin your current scroll position and return to that position later. Good for long reads, documentation and Wikipedia articles.
